title: Probiotic Pearls | Integrative Therapeutics®
description: Probiotic Pearls are a blend of active cultures including Lactobacillus and Bifidobacterium for healthy digestion and immune support in an easy to swallow capsule.*
cleaned_text: DIGESTIVE AND IMMUNE HEALTH* Probiotic Pearls are a blend of active cultures includingLactobacillus andBifidobacterium for digestive health in an easy to swallow capsule.* Normal bowel microflora, such asLactobacilli and Bifidobacteria species, support digestive health.* However, everyday factors such as poor diet, stress, and travel can disrupt the healthy balance of bacteria in your digestive tract. Probiotic Pearls were developed to help support digestive balance and colon and immune health.* WITH TRIPLE-LAYER TRUE DELIVERY TECHNOLOGY Probiotic Pearls use True Delivery Technology, an advanced triple-layer coating system that protects probiotics from heat, air, moisture and stomach acid to maximize survival and delivery to the intestine where they are needed most. The unique encapsulation also ensures Probiotic Pearls are shelf-stable and require no refrigeration, while maintaining full potency through the product's shelf life. UPC: 871791000018 SKU: 136001 DIRECTIONS Probiotic Pearls Directions and/or DosageAdults swallow 1 capsule daily, with water or your favorite beverage or as recommended by a healthcare professional. May be taken with or without food. Do not chew or crush. WarningIf you are pregnant, nursing, or taking prescription drugs, consult a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. This product has a tamper-evident foil pouch. Do not use if foil or plastic is punctured. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight. INTERACTIONS FAQS A: The gelatin in Probiotic Pearls is derived from fish (tilapia). A: Take them with meals, between meals, or whenever it is easiest for you to remember.
